headline.main: Mother Courage; How Vladimir Bukovsky was saved Bukovsky

docs.abstract: Ludmilla Thorne article on Vladimir Bukovsky focuses on relentless campaign by his mother, Nina, to rescue her son from Soviet labor camps, prisons and psychiatric wards; Mrs Bukovsky comments; por of Vladimir at age 14 and illus of Bukovskys' reunion in Zurich (L)
